remarks: Version of modular law that holds in a Hilbert lattice, when one element is an atom.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)
statement:
atmod.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atmod.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atmod.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atmod.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
atmod.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atmod4i1 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ P .<_ Y ) -> ( ( X ./\ Y ) .\/ P ) = ( ( X .\/ P ) ./\ Y ) ) $.
